long_description: The lightest natural F-Lite(TM) shoes available for women, the Inov8 F-Lite 219 Cross-Training Shoes deliver a zero drop and great responsiveness for your gym workouts and runs. Zero drop from heel to toe encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Mesh uppers are lined with mesh for great airflow and moisture management. Shoes create soft initial contact with the ground through the minimalist injected EVA midsoles. Wide forefoot delivers a better fit for those splaying their toes while working out. Rope-Tec(TM) technology ensures the shoes will stand up to abrasion and friction from ascending and descending ropes.
short_description: The lightest natural F-Lite(TM) shoes available for women, the Inov8 F-Lite 219 Cross-Training Shoes deliver a zero drop and great responsiveness for your gym workouts and runs.
